channel.title: Action button help { 317 } DELTA
channel.description: how can i make it so , that when I press on attack skill , an interface pops up and shows 10 people with highest attack xp?

item.title: Action button help { 317 } DELTA
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Well. about the interface poping up I can help you but the second part im not sure :s

  1. If you don’t already have this, put it in clickingmost.java right under “client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[a];”
System.out.println("Clicked button: " + c.actionButtonId + "");

this will make it so it shows you the clicked button id, in your command prompt, you can also do this for anything.

Then somewhere under a “break;” add

case ####: c.showInterface(***); break;

= number you saw in command prompt

**** = Interface id

or if you made a void displaying the player data (reccomended) then it would be

case ####: c.*****(); break;

= number you saw in command prompt

**** = void name

I won’t go into depth, I think i’ve spoon fed enough

Read full topic
